normal.speaker: John RPG
normal.line: My name is John... RPG is just what people called me.

normal.speaker: John RPG
normal.line: This place... it feels new, but strangely familiar.

normal.speaker: John RPG
normal.line: I can't remember my past, but I know I can build a future.

normal.speaker: John RPG
normal.line: This sword feels... right in my hand. Even if I don't know why.

normal.speaker: John RPG
normal.line: It's a strange world, but... I'm ready to face it.

taunt.speaker: John RPG
taunt.line: I don't know who you are. Well... I don't even know who I am.

taunt.speaker: John RPG
taunt.line: They called me a hero for a reason, so brace yourself!

taunt.speaker: John RPG
taunt.line: Look, I donâ€™t even know how I got here, but you for sure don't wanna mess with me!

taunt.speaker: John RPG
taunt.line: My memory might be gone, but my skills aren't. Let's do this.
